attributes.action: Do not invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details:
The key reasons for supporting this petition:

1) to leave is not in the nations interest 
2) the arguments to leave have not held up to post Brexit scrutiny 
3) we are in a position of weakness to negotiate with other EU states once Article 50 is invoked
attributes.background: Following the EU referendum we do not have to invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty and leave the EU. That is a Parlimentary decision that should involve considerable debate. We are not bound at this stage to follow the result to leave
